title: All Kinds of Musical Instruments
description: There are many different ways to play musical instruments. Some are played with a bow, some with sticks, and some with our hands. All Kinds of Musical Instruments is a colorful introduction to a wide variety of instruments. Detailed photographs support students' learning as they make connections to prior knowledge and practice the skill of classifying information.
